name: Barbara
title: Shining Idol
description: Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. She learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

normal.1: Perform up to 4 water splash attacks that deal <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro>.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal <hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</hydro> after a short casting time.

plunging.1: Gathering the might of Hydro, Barbara plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</hydro> upon impact with the ground.

description.0: Summons water droplets resembling musical notes that form a Melody Loop, dealing <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro> to surrounding opponents and applying the <hydro>Wet</hydro> status to them.
3: On hit, Barbara's Normal Attacks heal your own party members and nearby teammates for a certain amount of HP, which scales with Barbara's Max HP.
On hit, Barbara's Charged Attack generates 4 times the amount of healing.
Periodically regenerates your own active character's HP.
Applies the <hydro>Wet</hydro> status to the character and to opponents who come in contact with them.
description.5: Barbara's music is the magic that heals her companions.

description.0: Heals your own party members and nearby teammates for a large amount of HP that scales with Barbara's Max HP.
description.2: Barbara's desire to heal strengthens her will to fight and sing.

description.0: The Stamina Consumption of characters within Let the Show Begin♪'s Melody Loop is reduced by 12%.
When your active character gains an Elemental Orb/Particle, the duration of the Melody Loop of Let the Show Begin♪ is extended by 1s.
When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.
Decreases the CD of Let the Show Begin♪ by 15%.
description.1: During the ability's duration, your active character gains a 15% <hydro>Hydro DMG Bonus</hydro>.

description.0: Increases the Level of Shining Miracle♪ by 3.
Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her.
description.1: A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

description.0: Increases the Level of Let the Show Begin♪ by 3.
When Barbara is in the party but not on the field, and one of your own party members falls:
1: Fully restores the revived character's HP to 100%.
description.2: This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.
